name: HARD SKIP
description:
Made for the first ever ShenaniJam! 

Splitscreen Multiplayer same keyboard game!

I got the theme Hard Skip 

You basically hit the correct buttons to skip towards the other player in order to hit them farther then they hit you! 

Music by: Voltaic Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
